summary: Tested pagination and performance optimization features. All features working correctly: 1) Backend pagination with page/limit/total/pages structure, 2) all_data=true returns all reservations for CSV export, 3) Keywords pre-filled when editing offers (verified with TEST_Keywords_Offer), 4) Client search filters by title, description, and keywords.

issues: YouTube video shows 'Video unavailable' - the configured YouTube URL may be invalid or restricted (same as previous iteration)

passed_tests: CRITICAL: GET /api/reservations returns pagination structure with page, limit, total, pages
CRITICAL: Default pagination is page=1, limit=20
CRITICAL: GET /api/reservations?all_data=true returns all reservations for CSV export
CRITICAL: Pagination info displayed in Coach Dashboard: 'Affichage 1-3 sur 3 réservations'
CRITICAL: Keywords field pre-filled when editing offers (verified: 'fitness, cardio, danse, afrobeat, test')
CRITICAL: Offer edit form shows all fields: name, price, images, description, keywords
CRITICAL: Client search filters courses by name (e.g., 'cardio' shows 'Session Cardio')
CRITICAL: Client search filters offers by name, description, and keywords
Backend offers have keywords field in response
Reservation projection includes all necessary fields
critical_code_review_comments: Pagination implemented at line 535-596 in server.py with MongoDB projection for performance
startEditOffer function at line 670-691 correctly loads keywords: offer.keywords || ''
Client search at lines 2908-2937 in App.js filters by name, description, and keywords using searchWithSynonyms
Export CSV at line 246-270 in CoachDashboard.js uses all_data=true to get all reservations

test_credentials.coach_access: Triple click on '© Afroboost 2026' copyright text at bottom of page

seed_data_creation: Created 3 test reservations and 1 test offer with keywords for testing, then cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pagination and performance optimization features fully implemented and tested. Key behaviors: 1) GET /api/reservations returns {data: [], pagination: {page, limit, total, pages}}, 2) all_data=true bypasses pagination for CSV export, 3) Keywords field in offer form pre-fills from offer.keywords when clicking Modifier button, 4) Client search uses searchWithSynonyms to filter by name/description/keywords. Pagination buttons (Précédent/Suivant) only appear when pages > 1.
